Header: Poor Man Supplied with Raw Materials for House Construction
Content: Showing compassion and kindness in response to a plea, made by a helpless civilian in Sivamnagar, Puwarasankulam area, the 61 Division Headquarters of the Security Force Headquarters-Wanni provided a stock of raw materials for completion of his house on Thursday (10). Brigadier K. D. C. G J Thilakarathne, General Officer Commanding, 61 Division took steps to provide the hapless civilians with tin sheets, cement bags and bricks for completion of his house. Troops also facilitated transport of those items to the location. The beneficiary was also gifted with several saplings of economic value for planting in his garden where the house was being completed.
